TopicTitle: DLC mission 6 orbit of mun not working

Articles.Content: I am on mission 6 of DLC (Munar 1) and for whatever reason my orbit no matter how close i get it does not validate. Whats going wrong? is there a certain way the space craft needs to be set up for it to work? Photo of my orbit which I have gotten near 100% before but nothing happens. https://imgur.com/a/UBTPq2G
